description.english: Use one or more of your aliens to defeat an enemy in a very new way.
Lose your whole ship in a very new way.
Look at the achievements list.
Finish the tutorial (either from the Main Menu or in the Campaign).
Build your first ship in a real-time game.
Build your first ship in turn-based game.
Complete a flight.
Finish a game consisting of three flights.
Finish a pass & play game.
Play custom or online games with all possible combinations of flight levels.
Pay the penalty on all three rows of a single Combat Zone.
Take at least 3 hits during a single adventure.
Lose 20 or more components during one flight.
Claim an abandoned ship using your entire crew.
In the campaign: Win a bet with a trucker.
In the campaign: Unlock two alien species.
In the campaign: Escort a businessman on three trips.
In the campaign: Find buried treasure.
In the campaign: Unlock two sporty designs.
In the campaign: Unlock three ship designs, fresh from factory.
In the campaign: Win a Level III flight using an alien-designed ship with two aliens aboard.
In the campaign: Defeat yourself.
In the campaign: Get a friendly kiss.
In the campaign: Overcome temptation and do the right thing.
In the campaign: Cut a rope.
In the campaign: Bring someone to justice.
In the campaign: Deliver two crates of beverage to Regula in one flight.
In the campaign: Deliver undamaged shipments of explosives to three different asteroids.
In the campaign: Deliver undamaged shipments of radioactive isotopes from three different asteroids.
In the campaign: Earn 30 credits from a single heavy cargo delivery.
In the campaign: Deliver a complete shipment of four different types of special cargo in one flight.
In the campaign: Get a license for class II ships.
In the campaign: Get a license for class III ships.
In the campaign: Complete the ultimate mission.
Accomplish all other campaign achievements.
Finish at least 25 different Alien Technologies multiplayer missions in real-time mode.
Finish at least 25 different Alien Technologies multiplayer missions in turn-based mode.
Finish at least 25 different multiplayer missions in real-time mode.
Finish at least 25 different missions in turn-based mode.
Finish an online game with another player.
Reach rank 2 online.
Reach rank 5 online.
Reach rank 10 online.
You reached rank 15 online.
You reached rank 20 online.
You reached rank 25 online.
Finish at least 50 flights against people online.
Defeat at least 20 different players online.
Play a three-flight game against people online and win all three flights.
Play a three-flight game with the hardcore deck setting against people online and finish all three flights.
Have at least three online games going at the same time.
Win 3 online games in a row against human opponents.
Win 6 online games in a row against human opponents.
Get connected to an online real-time game.
Complete all Alien Technologies single-player challenges on standard difficulty.
Complete all Alien Technologies single-player challenges on hard difficulty.
Gain total dominance of 500.
Finish at least one flight with each specialization of cyan aliens.
Earn at least 120 credits in a custom game or online game.
Win a custom or online game by 40 credits or more.
Be the only player to finish a flight in a custom or online 4-player game.
Defeat three tough (red) bots in a three-flight real-time custom game
Defeat one Deep Blue bot in a three-flight turn-based duel.
Defeat all bot personalities in custom games.
Build a ship with at least 20 components that is perfectly protected against large meteors from the front, the left, and the right.
Finish a flight with a ship that has all 15 different kinds of basic components.
Win a flight with a ship that has at least 3 forward-pointing cannons below another component and 3 engines above another component.
Win a three-flight custom or online game without ever losing a component.
Lose no flight days to 3 Stardust adventures in a row.
Survive 12 Meteor Swarms in a row without losing a component.
Win the award for best-looking ship 6 times in a row.
While in the lead, land on the planet with the most valuable goods when you are unable to load the cargo.
Tie with enemies you could have defeated, enabling them to eliminate a player behind you.
Deliver at least 2 goods of each color in a single flight.
Use 6 batteries during a single adventure.
Defeat an enemy even though you have no forward-pointing cannons.
Claim an abandoned ship using aliens only.
Accomplish all other base-game Feats achievements.
Unlock 1000 spaces for everyone when building organic ships.
Shoot down, shield or bounce 100 meteors and shots in junkyards.
Build 100 ships in any mode.
Add 5000 components to your ships in any mode.
Shoot down 150 large meteors.
Successfully shield against 25 meteors or shots.
Overtake 30 opponents during Open Space or Stardust.
Advance 555 flight days during Open Space adventures.
Deliver 999 credits' worth of goods.
Load a total of 80 red cargo boxes on your ships.
Collect 200 credits for defeating pirate ships.
Defeat 40 slaver ships.
Confiscate 200 credits' worth of goods from smuggler ships.
Defeat enemies with a total strength of at least 666.
Accomplish all other base-game Devotion achievements.
